controls.name: statModelFile
controls.caption: File of statistical model
controls.description:
Model file, that will be used for prediction. It will be resolved relative the current folder, containing the executed chain.
Also you can use in this string Java system properties: "${name}", for example: "${java.io.tmpdir}", and executor system properties "${path.name.ext}", "${path.name}", "${file.name.ext}", "${file.name}", "${resources}" (chain path/file name with/without extension, resource folder of the platform, containing this function).

controls.name: defaultPredictor
controls.caption: Default ML predictor kind
controls.description: Default kind of the model file. It is to choose ML classifier, corresponding to this file format, if there is no .meta-file with this information, automatically created by MLTrain... functions.

controls.name: predictionRawOutput
controls.description: RAW_OUTPUT flag for predict() method in cv::ml::StatModel.

controls.name: predictionDTreesSum
controls.description: PREDICT_SUM flag for predict() method in cv::ml::DTrees (RTrees and Boost algorithms only).

controls.name: predictionDTreesMaxVote
controls.description: PREDICT_MAX_VOTE flag for predict() method in cv::ml::DTrees (RTrees and Boost algorithms only).

controls.name: predictionRoundResponses
controls.caption: Round responses
controls.description: If set and if the result responses are floating-point, the result is automatically cast to 32-bit integer with rounding to the nearest integer. This flag is ignored if the mode "Select indexes of maximum" is used.

controls.name: selectIndexesOfMaximalResponses
controls.caption: Select indexes of maximum
controls.description:
If set and if the result responses are multi-column (M>1 responses), the every response block in the result is automatically converted to a single 32-bit integer index K (categorical response), 0≤K<M — index of the result element in the given response with maximal value. It is useful for regression models, if you trained it with flag "Convert categorical responses".
Note: if the response is a single-column, of if the loaded statistical model is a classifier (not a regression), this flag is ignored and considered to be cleared.

controls.caption: Use GPU
controls.name: useGPU
controls.hint: Use OpenCV GPU optimization when possible
